sentences.sContent: In C4 plants there are two types of chloroplast.
sentences.sContent_eng: In C4 plants there are two types of chloroplast.
sentences.sCn: 在C4植物中有两种类型的叶绿体。

sentences.sContent: The chloroplast envelope has the light yellow color of violaxanthin.
sentences.sContent_eng: The chloroplast envelope has the light yellow color of violaxanthin.
sentences.sCn: 叶绿体的套膜有紫黄质的淡黄色。

sentences.sContent: The green leaves of vegetables through tissue homogenate, differential centrifugation separation, density gradient centrifugation purify sample of chloroplast.
sentences.sContent_eng: The green leaves of vegetables through tissue homogenate, differential centrifugation separation, density gradient centrifugation purify sample of chloroplast.
sentences.sCn: 对蔬菜绿叶通过组织匀浆，差速离心分离，密度梯度离心分离、纯化、提取叶绿体。

trans.tranOther: a plastid containing chlorophyll and other pigments, occurring in plants and algae that carry out photosynthesis
